about_the_game:
Welcome to the wildest nightclub in town...or should we say, the deadliest?  The Hellgate Club is a wacky, physics-based FSP gorefest. 

You're not here to party; you're here to hunt demons and unleash your unconventional weapons and classic crunchy blasters at the fast-moving hordes of possessed dancers and demonic monsters before they tear you apart. 

This super-gory blood-soaked bonanza doesn't hold back, pop the heads off, dismember monsters and demonic-possessed people with your classic double-barreled shotgun, or fry your enemies with lighting, use or gravity staff to throw them across the nightclub with interactive destructible backdrops.

Use bullet time to outwit the super-fast waves of enemies.

 Hunt down the demon queen in her hive before her power spills into the outside world.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature content, with exaggerated gore and blood using guns to kill and dismember monsters and demonic-possessed people. 

Contains some mild topless nudity in the exotic dance club.

name: The Hellgate Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4GB VRAM
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070

Linguagem imprópria
